title: Klang
description: A website for a startup business

body.raw:
Klang is a startup company based in Norway. Visit the website [here](https://klang.as/).

Tech stack:
* Contentlayer
* MDX
* Next.js v13
* Tailwind CSS v3
* TypeScript

![Klang's home page](/assets/works/klang/klang-home.png)
![Klang's news page](/assets/works/klang/klang-news.png)
![Klang's works page](/assets/works/klang/klang-works.png)
